thread.section_title: Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful stay
thread.title_full: Wonderful stay - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ilikeeatinglots
title: Wonderful stay
text: We were made to feel very welcome from the concierge and Reception team, to the breakfast team the next morning. The concierge was very helpful in helping us to find parking. The room was spotlessly clean and comfortable, I had a great night's sleep! This hotel is very central and it isn't too far to walk to Pimlico which I think is the nearest tube. The breakfast was tasty and plentiful. I suggest going earlier rather than later on a Sunday when it is less busy so you can really get the full enjoyment. Great, attentive service from the breakfast staff. I highly recommend and would love to stay again.
